title: Suited
description: Tanyana has chosen to help the Keeper, to stand against the Puppet Men, but has she bitten off more than she can chew?The bitter war between the sinister Puppet Men and the nebulous Keeper for the control of the ancient city of Movoc-under-Keeper has intensified. Tanyana, imprisoned within her suit, must choose sides. But when even her suit becomes aggressive against her, Tanyana must weigh some very personal issues against her determination to serve the greater good.
author: Jo Anderton
